name: Forged sterling silver Wisteria flower stud earrings with fresh water pearls
description:
These hand forged sterling silver single wisteria flower stud earrings are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of stud earrings. In the centre of each flower is a "bottle" /" beetle" green fresh water pearl 

Wisteria flower size is +- 12mm wide x 20mm length.
Pearl size: +- 4mm

These earrings come in silver or patina finish that I call blackened silver. Please specify in your order which you would prefer

Variations of pearl colours are available, simply email for options in stock.

Custom orders are welcome

name: Forged sterling silver Clover flower and vine wreath pendant: medium with green pearls
description:
Made to order

Forged sterling silver Clover flower and vine wreath pendant: medium with beetle green pearls

name: Forged sterling silver Dogwood/ Pea  flower stud earrings
description:
Forged sterling silver Dogwood/ Pea  flower stud earrings.These are finished of in a combination satin matt and polished highlights  
 

These forged Dogwood flower stud earrings are so named from a range of jewellery I recently did on native flowers in Western Downs region of Queensland Australia for the Dogwood gallery. This pea like flower is rather colourful but small in the wild and so the simplicity of this forged pea flower shape that sits away from the ear makes a statement.    

Flower size: fits into 14mm circle

name: Budding flower and vine wrap in forged sterling silver
description:
made to order

Budding flower and vine wrap in forged sterling silver

name: Forged sterling silver bell flower hooks with garnets
description:
Forged sterling silver bell flower hook earrings with garnets

These bell flower has moving part stamens to jingle lightly in the ear as well as 2 garnet beads to add weight and a splash of colour. The stem like structure of the hook is finished off with twig details.

Earring length: +_ 4.5/5cm

Custom orders are welcome

name: Forged sterling silver Angelica ring: med
description:
Made to order

Forged sterling silver dress ring features a medium sizes "Angelica" that sits over the knuckle and the ring wraps around the finger with a flowing forged form.

The "Angelica" comes from a design derived from Stag horn Ferns as their leaves unfurl. I've called them "Angelica" because they have an ethereal angel like look to them.

name: Forged sterling silver Large daisy solitaire pendant and chain
description:
This hand forged sterling silver Large Daisy solitaire pendant and chain make a simple yet elegant gift. Each flower is uniquely made and the design of the bail varies to suite each piece. The shape of the flower reflects the light leaving an illusion of a pearl within by the way the light plays. it is finished in a combination of satin matt and polished surfaces to make the most of the forge marks and dome shape. 

As each pendant is made the forge process insures a unique finish and no two are alike.

Flower size: fits in a 25mm circle
Chain length: 45 cm 

Custom orders are welcome
Longer length of chain is available for not much more just send me a message and I’ll give you a quote.

name: Forged silver Heart drop hook earrings with teardrop garnet stones
description:
Sometimes a Little splash of colour is all that is needed and these Forged silver heart drop earrings definitely do that. With a Forged silver heart to catch the light and a hand cut garnet teardrop to add a dangling essential splash of colour. The silver is finished off in a combination of satin matt and polished highlights to make the most of catching your attention  

They are sure to win your heart over. Simple but elegant!

Length: +- 3cm

Stones: Hand cut garnets 6mm x 5mm (sizes may vary) 
  
Heart: fits into 7mm circle

name: Forged silver star daisy solitaire pendant
description:
This hand forged sterling silver Star Daisy pendant and chain make a simple yet elegant gift. Each flower is uniquely made and the design of the bail varies to suite each piece. The shape of the flower reflects the light and is finished of in a combination of satin matt and polish highlighted areas.

As each pendant is made the forge process insures a unique finish and no two are alike.

Flower size: fits in a 20mm circle
Chain length: 45 cm 

Custom orders are welcome
Longer length of chain is available for not much more just send me a message and I’ll give you a quote

name: Double heart leaf forged sterling silver hook earrings
description:
These are a fun play on the heart shape studs but also have a stylized moth/butterfly feel to them too!….(a new obsession of mine that seems to be coming to the surface.)

These hand forged sterling silver double heart leaf hook earrings are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of earrings. The leaves are finished in a combination of satin matt and polished surfaces that catch the light in a unique way.

Double heart leaf size: +-(W) 18mm x (L) 8mm
Hook length: 3cm

Custom orders are welcome

name: Forged star daisy flower studs in sterling silver: small
description:
These hand forged sterling silver star daisy flower earrings are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of stud earrings. They are finished in a combination of satin matt and polished highlights.  

The star flower size is +- 10mm wide x 12mm length.

A patina finish that I call blackened silver is available. Please specify in your order if you would prefer this option

name: Forged double heart leaf studs: large
description:
These are a fun play on the heart shape but also have a stylized moth/butterfly feel to them too!….(a new obsession of mine that seems to be coming to the surface.)

These hand forged sterling silver double heart leaf studs are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of earrings. The leaves are finished in a combination of stain matt and polished surfaces that catch the light in a unique way.

Double heart leaf size: +-(W) 18mm x (L) 8mm

Custom orders are welcome

name: Forged silver mixed flower and budding stem ring with london blue topaz stone
description:
Made to order

Hand forged sterling silver ring trails along the hand with gradated mixed flower buds. leading the eye to a single forged flower with a single London blue topaz stone set in the centre.

description:

name: Mixed flower sterling silver drop hook earrings with london blue topaz stones
description:

Forged sterling silver drop hook earrings feature a forged leaf which draw the eye down to articulated forged flower and set London blue topaz stone in the centre.

name: Moving forged daisy flower ring with 24ct gold flower detail

Hand forged daisy flower ring with moving flower charms and 24ct gold flower detail

description:

These earrings come in silver or patina finish that I call blackened silver. Please specify in your order which you would prefer.

name: Hand forged daisy coctail ring with 24ct gold flower detail
description:
Made to order

Hand forged this cocktail ring is made from sterling silver with a 24ct gold flower detail in the middle.

name: Angelica stud earrings
description:
These sterling silver forged angelica studs are designed and created with the idea of stags horn ferns that seem to have angelic like leaves. Whimsical and unique each pair of earrings is hand forged and fabricated creating slight differences in each pair.

Earrings fit into +_14mm diameter circle

Custom orders are welcome

name: Hand forged double daisy ring in sterling silver
description:
Made to order

Hand forged sterling silver ring featuring 2 forged daisy flowers

name: Angelica hook earrings
description:
These sterling silver forged Angelica hook earrings are design and created with the idea of stags horn ferns that seem to have angelic like leaves. Whimsical and unique each pair of earrings is hand forged and differs slightly.

Earrings fit into +_20mm diameter circle
Length: 50mm

name: Forged silver Trailing Daisy pendant and earring set
description:
This hand forged silver pendant is a showstopper; coupled with a pair of small daisy flower earrings it is sure to be a fantastic gift.
 
From a textured forged dome a cascade of 4 different sized daisies fall in articulated movement and flow. The piece is finished in a combination of satin matt and polished highlighted areas to make the most of its textured surfaces and draw the eye in.

Daisy studs: 12mm flower
Pendant chain: 45cm length
Pendant:  (L) 58mm x (W) 20mm
Pendant 4 flowers sizes: 18mm, 16mm, 14mm and 10mm

Custom orders are welcome

Longer length of chain is available for not much more just send me a message and I’ll give you a quote

name: Forged silver "Turnover Heart" Stud earrings
description:
These simply shaped heart studs are a little more complex then they appear. I can’t keep anything the same choosing to hand draw into the tiny spaces left in my sheets of metal these little hearts. I love the way light bounces off curved in or rounded shapes and I couple the hearts with one of each. They are then finished in a combination of polished and matt surfaces to catch the light.

Heart leaf size: fits in 7mm circle.

Earrings can be finished with a blackened patina.

Custom orders are welcome

name: Daffodil orchid stud earrings
description:
These hand forged sterling silver stud earrings feature a single Daffodil Orchid flower. When I create my work it often crosses over flower varieties hence my Daffodil Orchid flower, not quite a Daffodil not quite an Orchid. 

Flower size: (w) 21mm x (l) 17mm

name: Daffodil orchid ring
description:
Hand forged silver shank leads to a single medium sized daffodil orchid flower. Rings are individually made and no two rings are alike

NB: Rings are made to order.

Flower size: 30mm (W) x 22mm (L)
Measurements: 30mm (H) x28mm (W)x 30mm (L) 

Note: 
 As each ring is made to order rings may vary slightly from the image.

 I do keep some rings in my stock but if it is not your ring size allow for 6 days for your ring to be made up wants ordered and the allocated time in my terms for postage.

Please check your ring size before purchasing this ring, this can be given as a letter size given by a jeweller or take an existing ring and measure the diameter in mm. Leave this info in your “message to seller”

Please email me if you would like any other alterations eg; additional flowers or change of finish, and I will give you a quote.

name: Daffodil orchid hook earrings
description:
These hand forged sterling silver hook earrings feature a single daffodil/ orchid flower. When I create my work it often crosses over flower varieties hence my daffodil orchid flower.
Flower size: 30mm (W) x 23mm (L) 
Earring length: 35mm

Custom orders are welcome!

name: Daisy solitare pendant: medium
description:
This hand forged sterling silver Daisy pendant and chain make a simple yet elegant gift. Each flower is uniquely made and the design of the bail varies to suite each piece. The shape of the flower reflects the light leaving an illusion of a pearl within by the way the light plays.

As each pendant is made the forge process insures a unique finish and no two are alike.

name: Daisy flower hook earrings: small
description:
These hand forged silver daisy flowers hook earrings dangle beautifully from the ear. 
Each flower is hand forged and then matched to create a unique pair of earrings.

The flowers size: +- 12mm wide
Hook length: +- 30mm.

Earrings are available in silver or can have a patina added to them to create a blackened silver look. Simply specify with your order which you would prefer

Blackened silver: is a patina that has been applied to the silver to create a blue black film on the surface that is then re-worked to show up the silver shine from below along the edges and highlighted areas of the forged flower.
Custom orders are welcome!

name: Leaf ring: hand forged sterling silver
description:
Uniquely made this is a stylish ring suitable on most hands. Each ring has a forged silver shank leading to a single forged stylised open leaf that crosses over the hand. 

Leaf size: (W) 20mm x (L) 8mm 
Rings are individually made and no two rings are alike

NB: Rings are made to order.

Note: 
• As each ring is made to order rings may vary slightly from the image.
• I do keep some rings in my stock but if it is not your ring size allow for 6 days for your ring to be made up wants ordered and the allocated time in my terms for postage.
• Please check your ring size before purchasing this ring, this can be given as a letter size given by a jeweller or take an existing ring and measuring the inside diameter in mm. Leave this info in your “message to seller”

name: Daisy flower hook earrings: hand forged sterling silver
description:
These hand forged silver daisy flowers hook earrings dangle beautifully from the ear. 
Each flower is hand forged and then matched to create a unique pair of earrings.
The flowers ( +- 18mm wide) are attached to long stem hook ( +- 30mm) in length.

Earrings are available in silver or can have a patina added to them to create a blackened silver look. Simply specify with your order which you would prefer

Blackened silver: is a patina that has been applied to the silver to create a blue black film on the surface that is than re-worked to show up the silver shine from below along the edges and highlighted areas of the forged flower.

name: Clover flower forged silver ring: small
description:
Hand forged silver shank leads to a single small Clover flower. Rings are individually made and no two rings are alike. Each shank had forged bends and twist that cannot be replicated making each unique. 

Clover flower size: fits into 11mm circle

Please note:

• I do keep some rings in my stock but if it is not your ring size allow for 6 to 12 days for your ring to be made up wants ordered and the allocated time in my terms for postage.
•Please check your ring size before purchasing this ring, this can be given as a letter size given by a jeweller or take an existing ring and measure the diameter in mm. Leave this info in your “message to seller”
 •Please email me if you would like any other alterations eg; additional flowers or change of finish, and I will give you a quote.

name: Star daisy stud earrings
description:
Star daisy stud earrings are pierced out and forged silver earrings that are purposefully mismatched, one big one small, to create a unique look .

These fun forged flowers are a pair, with a large flower (+-20mm) and smaller flower (+-15mm).

name: Clover flower forged silver studs
description:
These hand forged sterling silver clover flowers stud earrings are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of earrings. The flowers are finished in a combination of satin matt and polished surfaces that catch the light in a unique way.

The clover flower size is +_13mm diameter

Custom orders are welcome

name: Star tree flower forged silver hook earrings
description:
These small silver daisy are attached to a hook earring with a twig feature at the base of the earring that branch out like a tree, to this 2 x 4.5mm amethyst beads have been attached to one side for a flair of colour.

Earring length: +-3.5cm

For other variations of stones or pearl colours please contact me for quotes and prices or check listings for available variations. 

Custom orders are welcome

name: Leaf and garnet sterling silver hook earrings
description:
These sterling silver earrings feature a finely forged and chased leaf that mimics the concept of a stem. The earrings are then finished off with a single (4mm) garnet bead.

There is an option of choosing your earrings to be finished in silver or to have a blackened patina effect added to the leaf.

Earring length: +-3.5 cm

Custom orders are welcome

name: Orchid pod pendant forged silver with gold ball detail
description:
Hand forged sterling silver Orchid pendant and chain feature an orchid flower incased in a heart shaped forged silver pod with a 24ct gold ball in the centre as a highlight.

When each pendant is made the forge process insures a unique finish and no two are alike.

These orchid pendants are finished with a combination of polish and satin matt texture. Or a blackened patina can be applied for a dramatic option for the finish. Request that in your notes to purchase

Orchid flower and pod size: 25mm (W) x 40mm (L)

Chain length: 45 cm 

Custom orders are welcome

Longer length of chain is available for not much more just send me a message and I'll give you a quote

name: White Lotus flower ring: large
description:
Made to order, this sterling silver hand forged cocktail ring has a 24ct gold central flower and comes in a combination of polished and satin matt finish.
 
There are 3 flower/ leaf elements layered over each other. The base is pierced and forged the 2nd flower is acid white matt and the last is a central 24ct gold forged flower. The flowers sit well balanced on the hand as a forged vine band wraps around the flower and finger.
 
Note: 

Please write a note in your on your purchase to indicate your ring size. 

This piece is made to order so allow 2 weeks upon confirmation of sale for manufacture.

For any other queries please email me: michelle_pujol@hotmail.com 

Variation from the images may occur as pieces are handmade

name: Wisteria forged silver hook earrings: bottle green fresh water pearls
description:
These hand forged sterling silver single wisteria flower hook earrings are individually made and matched to create a unique pair of earrings. In the centre of each flower is bottle green / beetle green fresh water pearl 

Wisteria flower size is +- 15mm wide x 23mm length.
Pearl size: +- 5mm
Earrings length: 45mm

These earrings come in silver or patina finish that I call blackened silver. Please specify in your order which you would prefer

Variations of pearl colours are available, simply email for options in stock.

Custom orders are welcome

name: Shell lotus flower cocktail ring: large
description:
This statement piece is made to order.
Made from sterling silver, the cocktail ring is hand forged to create a spiralling, shell like flower that sits proud from the hand. The flower spirals in to the centre which focuses the eye on a 24ct gold ball. The ring is finished in a combination of polished and a satin matt finishes.

Note: 
Please write a note in your on your purchase to indicate your ring size. 
This piece is made to order so allow 2 weeks upon confirmation of sale for manufacture.
Variation from the images may occur as pieces are handmade

name: Blackened Lotus flower ring: large
description:
Sterling silver cocktail ring with fresh water pearls and finished with a blackening patina.
 
Made to order, this sterling silver cocktail ring sits well balanced on the hand. Fresh water pearls in metalic blue or green draw the eye into the centre of the flower where a contrasting central small daisy sits.
 
Note: 

The blackening patina finish is dramatic look but if you would like a silver matt and polish look simply write a note in your purchase.
 
Please write a note in your on your purchase to indicate your ring size. 

This piece is made to order so allow 2/3 weeks upon confirmation of sale for manufacture.
 
For any other queries please email me: michelle_pujol@hotmail.com 

Variation from the images may occur as pieces are handmade.
